Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory67.jpg'}
{3: 'Record ID: HX-GA-25133-Kowloon local. Confirm recovery?'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Recovery confirmed. Verify keywords "Kowloong"" and ""Art"?'}
{3: 'Verifying keywords "Kowloong"" and ""Art"... Confirmed.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Confirm data resource extraction.'}
{3: '633420 relevant entries found...'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'After applying the S-Kowloong priority filter, top priority results have yielded 25133 records.'}
{3: 'Confirmed. Extracting data...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory233.png'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'It is the autumn in an age of prosperity...'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'And today, attending our stage of "Paragon Sovereign", are dignitaries and ladies with insight and appreciation for the arts...'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'And wherefore? Because a rare performance graces the "Paragon Sovereign" tonight!'}
{2: 'Host', 3: '...As you all know, we have a play that has been shelved for quite some time. Only when the right actor is cast, can it take to the stage.'}
{2: 'Host', 3: '...Those clapping in the audience, you must be a scholar in plays! The last time this was performed, I was still in my nappies!'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "To tell you the truth, we hit a stroke of luck in raising a new actor. He may be new to the stage, but his moves! His alacrity! You can tell that he's the real deal at a glance!"}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Without further ado, feast your eyes folks! Raise the curtains...'}
{3: 'As the curtain rises, gongs and drums roar on the stage. The expectant audience falls into silence. The stage quickly erupts into a battlefield as soldiers with various weapons appear onstage.'}
{2: 'Commander', 3: 'Yaaah——!'}

{3: "The commander storms the camp's colorful gate waving his spear. It collides with the enemies' blades; their faces press against each other. Suddenly, the enemies are sent somersaulting, their braids flying in the air."}
{2: 'Scholar', 3: 'Your Majesty—the Iron City is in peril. Without any soldiers to break through their formation—'}
{2: 'Scholar', 3: 'The city gates—will be open to the rebels!'}
{2: 'His Majesty', 3: 'My people! Who is willing—to heed the call—and quell this rebellion?'}
{3: 'The music stops abruptly. The warriors, scholar, commander, and the emperor shift their gazes to a figure that has leaped onto the stage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Lad', 3: 'I might just be a mere civilian, but I have earned myself a name of "Black Guardian" in the streets. I volunteer!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'His Majesty', 3: 'You might don humble robes, but you are one of good heart!'}

{2: 'Young Lad', 3: "I come bearing the will of my friend. I have fought with rebels on my way here, and suffered much. Yet so, I only wish to defeat the rebels so as to comfort my friend's spirit in Heaven!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Young Lad', 3: "If you send me, the rebels will surely underestimate me due to my age. Then I shall take their leader's head, and the rebels will scatter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'His Majesty', 3: 'Good child, when you return in triumph, I will hire a renowned craftsman to forge a suit of armor worthy only of your brave soul!'}
{2: 'His Majesty', 3: 'I will reward you for your outstanding bravery!'}
{2: 'Young Lad', 3: 'I shall not let you down, Your Majesty!', 4: '1'}
